### Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] This tool is **not** already in the list
- [ ] The tool is actively maintained and publicly accessible
- [ ] I added only **one** tool in this PR
- [ ] I used the correct table format with logo:

```
| <img src="https://www.google.com/s2/favicons?domain=example.com&sz=32" width="16"> | [Tool Name](https://example.com) | ✅/❌ Free Tier | ✅/❌ API | Short description. |
```

- [ ] I placed the tool in the correct category
- [ ] The description is **one sentence**, factual, and without marketing language
- [ ] Free tier and API availability are accurate
